meaning_str.bing:
v. 怀疑；不相信；不能肯定；无把握
n. 疑问；疑惑；不相信；不确定
网络. 虐童疑云；疑虑；疑惧

怀疑；不相信；不能肯定；无把握
疑问；疑惑；不相信；不确定

怀疑；疑问；疑惑；不确定；不相信；疑心；猜疑；不肯定；不确信
怀疑；质疑；不相信；不确定；不能肯定；无把握；认为…未必可能；对…有疑问

0.cn: 你怎么能怀疑我的诚意呢?

1.en: As a matter of interest, do you ever doubt?
1.cn: 我想问问，你从不怀疑别人吗？

2.en: Why hast thou forsaken me, O deity whose existence I doubt?
2.cn: 神啊，我一直怀疑你的存在，你为何抛弃我？

3.en: I don't doubt the honesty of young Pegg. That is not at all what I asked.
3.cn: 我不怀疑佩格先生的正直。这是答非所问。

4.en: Yesterday was the hardest I've worked in my life. I have no doubt of that.
4.cn: 昨天是我一生中最艰难的一天。我毫不怀疑。

5.en: Now, Peeta, I doubt that the rebels will ever let her see this.
5.cn: 可现在，皮塔，我怀疑起义军绝不会让她看到这段视频。

6.en: I doubt you'd understand. Sheldon tells me you only have a master's degree.
6.cn: 我怀疑你听不听得懂，谢尔顿告诉我你只有个硕士学位。

7.en: I know I can always count on you for a draught of self-confidence whenever I start to doubt.
7.cn: 我知道我怀疑自己的时候，你肯定会为我鼓劲。

8.en: What I know I don't doubt it's going to be hard. It won't be hard. It will be impossible.
8.cn: 我只晓得我不怀疑这会很难。不是难，是不可能。

9.en: Okay, that, right there, that equivocation and self-doubt, that is not the American spirit.
9.cn: 就是这种支吾的语气和自我怀疑，这可不是美国精神。

10.en: Yup, there's no inflammation at all, Sheldon. Then it must be a tumor. I seriously doubt it.
10.cn: 没有任何炎症，谢尔顿。那我肯定得肿瘤了。我深表怀疑。

11.en: Can I make you a cup of tea? I doubt it, but if anyone has a chance, it's probably you.
11.cn: 能给你沏杯茶吗？我怀疑你的能力，不过有机会的人只有你了。

12.en: He has much doubt his Khan will make the true decision. He wanted to use you to sway my mind.
12.cn: 他是怀疑他的大汗能否做出正确的决定，他想让你对我吹吹枕边风。

13.en: I need to speak to you. It's 2:00 in the morning! It's important. I highly doubt that. Go away.
13.cn: 我得找你谈谈。现在是凌晨2点。很重要的事。我严重怀疑，走开。

14.en: Well sure, if you say you're gonna take care of everything, I have no reason to doubt you. Give me those forms.
14.cn: 当然，既然你说你会搞定，我当然没理由怀疑，你把表给我。

15.en: I can't do that. What if he serves haggis and blood pudding? I really doubt that's what he'll serve.
15.cn: 我可不干，万一他做了羊杂碎和黑香肠呢？我对他会上这两道菜深表怀疑。

16.en: She knew you'd doubt her motives. Let her make it up to you. She promises it will be worth something to all three of you.
16.cn: 她知道你怀疑她的动机，让她做出补偿吧，她保证这对你们三个都有好处。

17.en: Their lives are blissful. In a way, their existence is purer than ours, freed of the burden of self-doubt.
17.cn: 他们的生活非常幸福，在某种程度上，他们的生活方式比我们更加纯粹，没有自我怀疑的负担。

18.en: If you are ever afraid, if ever you doubt your place in the world, follow The Three Sisters and they will lead you home.
18.cn: 如果你感到害怕了，如果你开始怀疑自己存在的意义了，跟着三姐妹星，它们会带你回家。

19.en: Somehow, I doubt she'll take much convincing.
19.cn: 我觉得她不会很难说服的。
